name: Sumatra Robusto
additionalNotes: From Thompson's website: There's no nice way to put it, our dear pal Jose Dominguez from Victor Sinclair got screwed. A few months back, a certain very loud internet retailer, placed a huge order for Tesoro Cubanoâ€¦ and backed out when it came time to pay. TADA-DA-DA, Thompson to the rescue! When we heard about Jose's unfortunate situation, we flew down to the Dominican Republic and bought every bundle of Tesoro Cubano at a healthy (but fair) discount. Tesoro Cubano is a medium bodied, mixed filler Dominican smoke with a rich Sumatra binder.
